zachvac

No matter what genre you listen to, some of the best stuff is on the albums themselves and don't even make air play. Here's my example. One of my favorite songs by Boston is "I Had A Good Time." I never hear that on the radio.

 
 
 Because in general they want the singles to be songs that will be liked by the most amount of people, not liked the most by some people. They would rather everyone think it's pretty good than some think it's super-amazing and most mildly dislike it or be neutral about it. They are trying to reach lots of people and unfortunately you don't hear the best songs on the radio.
